original_text: So they drew near to the village to which they were going. He acted as if he were going farther,
korean_text: 그들이 가는 마을에 가까이 가매 예수는 더 가려 하는 것 같이 하시니

sentences.original_text: So they drew near to the village
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 그들은 그 마을에 가까이 갔는데

sentences.original_text: He acted as if he were going farther,
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 더 멀리 가려는 것처럼 행동하였는데,
